pkgmetadata.longdescription: Colors for NEST Graphs // Clinical reporting figures require to use consistent colors and configurations. As a part of the Roche open-source clinical reporting project, namely the NEST project, the 'nestcolor' package specifies the color code and default theme with specifying 'ggplot2' theme parameters. Users can easily customize color and theme settings before using the reset of NEST packages to ensure consistent settings in both static and interactive output at the downstream.
